FilterTypeCategoriesName.description: The singular name of the filter type used for categories.

FilterTypeCategoriesNamePlural.description: The plural name of the filter type used for categories.

FilterTypeCategoriesLabelNone.message: You have not filtered any categories yet.
FilterTypeCategoriesLabelNone.description: The message displayed when the user does not have any filtered categories.

FilterTypeCategoriesLabelHelp.message: You can filter categories by adding them below.
FilterTypeCategoriesLabelHelp.description: The message displayed to help the user filter new categories.

FilterTypeCategoriesPlaceholderText.description: The message displayed on the placeholder for deviations filtered by a category

FilterTypeCategoriesPropertyPathHint.message: Deviations submitted to the selected category, or to any category under the selected category, will be filtered
